amendment.description: To clarify how the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development shall manage and dispose of multifamily properties owned by the Secretary.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2803 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2803 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Schumer. (consideration: CR S11374; text: CR S11374) To clarify how the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development shall manage and dispose of multifamily properties owned by the Secretary.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2803 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2803 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Schumer.
